title: My first R package
text: can install development version mypackage GitHub :

title: My first R package
text: basic example shows solve common problem: special using README.Rmd instead just README.md? can include R chunks like : ’ll still need render README.Rmd regularly, keep README.md --date. devtools::build_readme() handy . can also embed plots, example:  case, don’t forget commit push resulting figure files, display GitHub CRAN.
code: library(mypackage) ## basic example code summary(cars) #>      speed           dist        #>  Min.   : 4.0   Min.   :  2.00   #>  1st Qu.:12.0   1st Qu.: 26.00   #>  Median :15.0   Median : 36.00   #>  Mean   :15.4   Mean   : 42.98   #>  3rd Qu.:19.0   3rd Qu.: 56.00   #>  Max.   :25.0   Max.   :120.00

title: Split a string — strsplit1
text: x character vector one element. split split .

title: Split a string — strsplit1
code: x <- "alfa,bravo,charlie,delta" strsplit1(x, split = ",") #> Error in strsplit1(x, split = ","): could not find function "strsplit1"
